contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|opposite|opposites}} '''Opposite''' may refer to: * [[Opposite (semantics)]], a word that means the opposite of a word * In botany opposite is a kind of [[Leaf#Arrangement on the stem|arrangement of leaves]] * [[Additive inverse]], in mathematics, taking the negative ("opposite") of a number * [[Dual (category theory)|Opposite category]] or dual category, in category theory * An opposite hitter, also an opposite, is a position in [[volleyball]] * [[Opposites (album)|''Opposites'' (album)]], by Scottish alternative rock band Biffy Clyro, released on 28 January 2013 * [[The Opposites]], Dutch rap duo ==See also== * [[Opposition (disambiguation)]] * [[Contrary (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation}} [[Category:Mathematical disambiguation]]
